mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.biaoha AS "biaoha", a.bumenid AS "bumenid", a.xingming AS "xingming", a.bianma AS "bianma", a.shenfenzhenghao AS "shenfenzhenghao", a.chushengriqi AS "chushengriqi", a.xingbie AS "xingbie", a.minzu AS "minzu", a.gongzuoriqi AS "gongzuoriqi", a.bangongshidianhua AS "bangongshidianhua", a.dianziyoujian AS "dianziyoujian", a.zhiyeleibie AS "zhiyeleibie", a.zhiyefanwei AS "zhiyefanwei", a.zhiyezhenghao AS "zhiyezhenghao", a.gulizhiwu AS "gulizhiwu", a.zhuanyejishuzhiwu AS "zhuanyejishuzhiwu", a.pinrenjishuzhiwu AS "pinrenjishuzhiwu", a.xueli AS "xueli", a.suoxuezhuanye AS "suoxuezhuanye", a.liuxueshijian AS "liuxueshijian", a.liuxuequdao AS "liuxuequdao", a.jieshoupeixun AS "jieshoupeixun", a.keyanketi AS "keyanketi", a.gerenjianjie AS "gerenjianjie", a.jiandangshijian AS "jiandangshijian", a.chedangshijian AS "chedangshijian", a.chedangyuanyin AS "chedangyuanyin", a.bieming AS "bieming", a.qianming AS "qianming", a.qianmingtupian AS "qianmingtupian", a.zigezhengshuhao AS "zigezhengshuhao", a.zhiyekaishishijian AS "zhiyekaishishijian", a.chufangquanbiaozhi AS "chufangquanbiaozhi", a.zhandian AS "zhandian", a.shoushudengji AS "shoushudengji"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO useable_renyuanbiao( id, biaoha, bumenid, xingming, bianma, shenfenzhenghao, chushengriqi, xingbie, minzu, gongzuoriqi, bangongshidianhua, dianziyoujian, zhiyeleibie, zhiyefanwei, zhiyezhenghao, gulizhiwu, zhuanyejishuzhiwu, pinrenjishuzhiwu, xueli, suoxuezhuanye, liuxueshijian, liuxuequdao, jieshoupeixun, keyanketi, gerenjianjie, jiandangshijian, chedangshijian, chedangyuanyin, bieming, qianming, qianmingtupian, zigezhengshuhao, zhiyekaishishijian, chufangquanbiaozhi, zhandian, shoushudengji ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{biaoha}, #{bumenid}, #{xingming}, #{bianma}, #{shenfenzhenghao}, #{chushengriqi}, #{xingbie}, #{minzu}, #{gongzuoriqi}, #{bangongshidianhua}, #{dianziyoujian}, #{zhiyeleibie}, #{zhiyefanwei}, #{zhiyezhenghao}, #{gulizhiwu}, #{zhuanyejishuzhiwu}, #{pinrenjishuzhiwu}, #{xueli}, #{suoxuezhuanye}, #{liuxueshijian}, #{liuxuequdao}, #{jieshoupeixun}, #{keyanketi}, #{gerenjianjie}, #{jiandangshijian}, #{chedangshijian}, #{chedangyuanyin}, #{bieming}, #{qianming}, #{qianmingtupian}, #{zigezhengshuhao}, #{zhiyekaishishijian}, #{chufangquanbiaozhi}, #{zhandian}, #{shoushudengji} )
mapper.update: UPDATE useable_renyuanbiao SET biaoha = #{biaoha}, bumenid = #{bumenid}, xingming = #{xingming}, bianma = #{bianma}, shenfenzhenghao = #{shenfenzhenghao}, chushengriqi = #{chushengriqi}, xingbie = #{xingbie}, minzu = #{minzu}, gongzuoriqi = #{gongzuoriqi}, bangongshidianhua = #{bangongshidianhua}, dianziyoujian = #{dianziyoujian}, zhiyeleibie = #{zhiyeleibie}, zhiyefanwei = #{zhiyefanwei}, zhiyezhenghao = #{zhiyezhenghao}, gulizhiwu = #{gulizhiwu}, zhuanyejishuzhiwu = #{zhuanyejishuzhiwu}, pinrenjishuzhiwu = #{pinrenjishuzhiwu}, xueli = #{xueli}, suoxuezhuanye = #{suoxuezhuanye}, liuxueshijian = #{liuxueshijian}, liuxuequdao = #{liuxuequdao}, jieshoupeixun = #{jieshoupeixun}, keyanketi = #{keyanketi}, gerenjianjie = #{gerenjianjie}, jiandangshijian = #{jiandangshijian}, chedangshijian = #{chedangshijian}, chedangyuanyin = #{chedangyuanyin}, bieming = #{bieming}, qianming = #{qianming}, qianmingtupian = #{qianmingtupian}, zigezhengshuhao = #{zigezhengshuhao}, zhiyekaishishijian = #{zhiyekaishishijian}, chufangquanbiaozhi = #{chufangquanbiaozhi}, zhandian = #{zhandian}, shoushudengji = #{shoushudengji} WHERE id = #{id}
